original_text: And when the money was all spent in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came to Joseph and said, “Give us food. Why should we die before your eyes? For our money is gone.”
korean_text: 애굽 땅과 가나안 땅에 돈이 떨어진지라 애굽 백성이 다 요셉에게 와서 이르되 돈이 떨어졌사오니 우리에게 먹을 거리를 주소서 어찌 주 앞에서 죽으리이까

sentences.original_text: And when the money was all spent
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 돈이 모두 다 쓰였을 때

sentences.original_text: in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan
all the Egyptians came to Joseph
Why should we die before your eyes?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 우리가 당신 앞에서 죽어야 합니까?
왜냐하면 우리 돈은 다 없어졌기 때문입니다
